text: Are you alright, Pell? You've been asleep for days!
speaker: hero1

text: So you can't see anything, aye? Another gift from the Awakening. Just be grateful you have both feet.
speaker: hero1

text: You lot look in need of a good healer. Lucky for you, here I am!
speaker: hero1

text: Let's see what you can do.
speaker: hero1

text: Remember how to rotate? Press the left or right arrow key to rotate yourself.
speaker: hero1

text: You won't be able to hear me unless you face me. Rotate until you hear my voice louder!
speaker: hero1

text: Good. The better you can hear me, the closer you are to finding my location.
speaker: hero1

text: Press the 1 key to cast a healing spell.
speaker: hero1
